alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Chickasaw (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 24 at 10:31PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Chickasaw and southeastern Calhoun Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 1031 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Vardaman, or 9 miles southwest of Houston, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Houston, Calhoun City, Vardaman, Derma, Slate Springs, Pyland, Woodland, Sparta, Thorn, Thelma, Tabbville, Anchor, Atlanta and Slate Spring. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for northeastern Mississippi.
